text: Prince Regent DLR station is a station on the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) in the Docklands area of East London. The station was opened on 28 March 1994. It provides access to the eastern end of the ExCeL Exhibition Centre. The station signage is subtitled 'for ExCeL East'. There is a small bus station adjoining the station. Buses from here go to Plaistow and London City Airport. The station is on the DLR's Beckton branch, between Custom House and Royal Albert stations. It is in Travelcard Zone 3. Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham
title: Prince Regent DLR station
